desc: Happier Beauty Toothpaste. No single-use plastic tubes. All packaging is recycled or recyclable. Papaya for natural whitening, vitamin E for gums, minerals for strong enamel, 100% natural mint. No SLS, triclosan, parabens, colours or artificial sweeteners. Vegan. Suitable for sensitive teeth.

layout.text: Try Happier Beauty's new subscription service ❤︎
Save money with our easy flex toothpaste subscription!
